name: hv_reg_t
desc: The type that defines general registers.

items.name: var HV_REG_CPSR: hv_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the current program status register (CPSR).

items.name: var HV_REG_LR: hv_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the link register (LR).

items.name: var HV_REG_PC: hv_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the program counter (PC).

items.name: var HV_REG_FP: hv_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the frame pointer (FP).

items.name: var HV_REG_FPCR: hv_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the floating-point control register (FPCR).

items.name: var HV_REG_FPSR: hv_reg_t
items.desc: The value that identifies the floating-point status register (FPSR).
